\csdef{set_colours}{%
    \definecolor{zhblue}{HTML}{3F98CC}%
    \definecolor{zhgrey}{HTML}{969696}%
%
    \definecolor{zhturqoise}{HTML}{3FB8B9}%
    \definecolor{zhgreen}{HTML}{6DBD72}%
    \definecolor{zhyellow}{HTML}{EBD760}%
    \definecolor{zhorange}{HTML}{F08D47}%
    \definecolor{zhred}{HTML}{EA4D51}%
    \definecolor{zhviolet}{HTML}{A585B7}%
}
